title.rendered: Questions to ask at an appointment

content.rendered:
Parents in our online groups often ask what questions to ask their ENT, audiologist, speech therapist etc. Here are a few of good resources from the United States. They are a good starting point for parents when thinking about their next appointment.

Download the Real Life Tips infographic.

More information:

  • ENT questions  
  • Audiologist questions 
  • Early intervention questions 
  • Speech pathologist questions 
  • Medical professional questions
